attributes.action: Create a motorway link from M54 to Welshpool
attributes.additional_details:
The infrastructure through to Mid Wales is really poor, we need to look at extending  the M54 motorway at Telford through to Welshpool this will ensure business growth and therefore create more jobs for residents of Mid Wales.
creating a motorway link will encourage new businesses into the area and allow the Welsh to look further afield for work
